treasury-name-required: Please enter a name for your treasury
at-least-two-owners-required: At least two owners are required
amount-negative: Amount must be greater than zero
start-date-time-required: Stream start date and time is required
start-date-time-before-today: Stream start date and time must be after current time
end-date-time-required: Stream completion date and time is required
end-date-time-before-start-date-time: Stream completion date and time must be after stream start
file-size-error: File size must be less than 200KB
export-end-date-time-before-today-date: Date must be less or equal to today's date
export-end-date-time-before-start-date: Date must be after start date
export-start-date-time-before-today: Start date must be before today
receiver-self: Stream can't be send to connected wallet
deposit-max-amount: Insufficient fund in your wallet to deposit
